attributes.action: Ban MP's and the Prime minister from having other job occupations
attributes.additional_details: Too many laws and legislations have been created to serve more so, the people's in power bests interests rather than UK citizens. If this law is passed, the risk of this will decrease immensely, creating a society based more for the citizens wellbeing rather than corporations interest and wellbeing.
attributes.background: To stop letting people in power of the United Kingdom have more than one job occupation. So first and foremost putting their MP or prime minister job role, and their for the best interests of the UK people before their own interests and other job occupations.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban MPs from having second jobs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600866
